creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: purple yuzen uchikake with carts, flowers, trees and cloud motifs
medium: Yūzen-dyed and embroidered silk, cotton-filled bottom
text: This wedding robe, or uchikake, evokes the grandeur of the classical Japanese imperial court with depictions of luxurious items like standing curtains (kichō), drums with decorative flame-shaped frames (kaen daiko), and court carriages (gosho-kuruma), along with golden mist, a pine tree, and assorted flowers.
title: Wedding robe
